title: A little blurb
description: A brief field-note recording a moment of embodied boundary-setting carried out with compassion. This piece documents an encounter where mercy was maintained without submission, marking a live calibration of discernment within the phase The Seat at the Table.
author: Aleksandr

fieldDefinitions.phase: The Bloom phase expressing the emotional, moral, and symbolic state in which the work was created.
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: The moment or period during which the phase was lived or embodied, not necessarily when the work was published.
fieldDefinitions.motifMap: Key symbolic elements and their meanings as they appear within the work.
fieldDefinitions.associatedMedia: Images or media connected to the piece, if any.
fieldDefinitions.generatedBy: The system and date used to generate this metadata.

motifMap.meaning: Compassion that holds its shape under pressure

associatedMedia.description: Text-only Substack post; no associated images.
